titles.title: Censuring and condemning Adam Schiff, Representative of California's 30th Congressional District.
Censuring and condemning Adam Schiff, Representative of California's 30th Congressional District.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ethics.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns and censures Representative Adam Schiff for conduct that misleads the American people and directs the Committee on Ethics to investigate that conduct.
